export default class App extends React.Component {
  constructor (props) {
    super(props)
    this.state = { message: 'Hello World' }
  }
  render () {
    return (
      <div className="box-react">
        React {this.state.message}
      </div>
    )
  }
}
App.__style__ = `
  .box-react { color: red; }   
`

  <div class="box-vue">Vue {{ message }}</div>
</template>

  data: () => ({ message: 'Hello World' })
}
</script>

.box-vue { color: red; }
</style>
